title: We're Hiring: Customer Support Specialist at NOVA Agency
job_overview:
Location: Remote
Position Type: Part-time to Full-time
Start Date: ASAP

About Us

At NOVA Agency, we provide exclusive access to high-level Meta, Google, and TikTok ad accounts that come with no spend limits and no risk of bans. Our clients include eCommerce brands, agencies, and media buyers who rely on us for smooth, uninterrupted advertising – and we make sure they get exactly that.

We’re looking for a motivated, detail-oriented, and responsive individual to join our team as a Customer Support Specialist. Please write the word Juice in your message sent to us. You’ll be the first point of contact for our clients and play a key role in helping them succeed with their ad accounts.

What You’ll Do

Provide fast, clear, and friendly support
Help clients with ad account questions, top-up instructions, and general guidance
Coordinate with the internal team to resolve account-related issues quickly
Keep communication structured and ensure no client is left waiting
Maintain accurate client data and offer a smooth, professional experience

Requirements

Fluent in English – both written and spoken
Strong understanding of Meta advertising (Pro)
Highly responsive, organised, and solution-driven
Able to manage multiple conversations at once without losing quality
Quick learner with a proactive mindset
Able to work independently and take ownership of tasks

What We Offer

100% remote flexibility
A professional but informal work culture
Clear growth opportunities within the company
A supportive team that values speed, ownership, and trust

Want to Join Us?

Send us a message with your CV and a short intro about who you are and why you’re a fit for the role.
